de.systemagmbh.tools.config
Class CSysSourcelessConfig

java.lang.Object
  de.systemagmbh.tools.config.CSysSourcelessConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, ISysComponent, ISysConfig, Serializable
public class CSysSourcelessConfig
extends Object
implements Serializable, Cloneable, ISysConfig

This class implements a sourceless configuration.

Supported properties:

  • configNameLabel
  • configPriorityLabel

Version:
$Revision: 1.5 $
Author:
Eugen Obermeier
See Also:

Method Detail

init

public void init(Properties p,
                 String propsPrefix)
          throws CSysConfigIOException
Initializes the configuration specified by the given properties. Needed keys have to start with the given propsPrefix.

Specified by:
init in interface ISysConfig
Parameters:
p - must contain the following keys:
  • "propsPrefix"."configNameLabel" (default: ".name")
  • "propsPrefix"."configPriorityLabel" (default: ".priority")
propsPrefix - every property key must start with this prefix. (But: The component properties like configPathLabel come without prefix!)
Throws:
CSysConfigIOException - if an IOException occurs while initialisation

reInit

public void reInit()
            throws CSysConfigIOException
Cannot Reinitialise. Only prints a comment to System.err !!!

Specified by:
reInit in interface ISysConfig
Throws:
CSysConfigIOException - if an I/O-Excepton occurs during reinitialisation

merge

public ISysConfig merge(ISysConfig conf,
                        boolean append)
                 throws CSysConfigFormatException
config is null after init. merge will throw a CSysConfigException in this case. Use setRoot(de.systemagmbh.interfaces.config.ISysConfigItem) to set a root item for this configuration. The class of the root item determines the type of each item in the resulting tree.

Specified by:
merge in interface ISysConfig
Parameters:
conf - the configuration to merge to this configuration.
append - Sets the merge operation. If append = false children in this configuration with the same name and path like children in the specified configuration will be overwritten   by the children in the given configuration. Otherwise, if append = true; this configuration contains all children from the given configuration.
Returns:
the resulting configuration
Throws:
CSysConfigFormatException - if merging fails (e. g. a certain item is a parameter in A, but a section in B ==> a parameter can't contain sections)
See Also:
ISysConfig.merge(de.systemagmbh.interfaces.config.ISysConfig, boolean)
